The investigator prospectively enroll 20 adult patient obese ( Body Mass Index 35kg/m2 high ) provide write informed consent . The study participant randomize 1:1 either treatment arm placebo arm . The treatment arm receive induction FMT capsule follow monthly maintenance dose oral capsule 12 week total . The placebo group receive placebo capsule induction follow monthly intake oral placebo capsule 12 week .
